documents: can you give or provide me the BIR form for application of registration
send me the bir form for the Application of registration
do you have the application of registration form for the BIR
answer: Here is the BIR Form 1903, {=https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/arodmw7p1rgvmm283myto/BIR_application_of_registration.pdf?rlkey=tgl7hme01yy4nha0qfay00cnr&dl=1=} also known as the Application for Registration for Corporations/ Partnerships (Taxable/Non-Taxable), is a form used by businesses in the Philippines to register with the Bureau of Internal Revenue (BIR). This form is specifically designed for corporations and partnerships, whether they are taxable or non-taxable entities.

documents: How can I apply for a birth certificate in Bacoor City?
Do you have the form or document for the application of birth certiface
Send me the certificate of live birth form
answer: To apply for a birth certificate in Bacoor City, you can fill out the application form provided in this link {=https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/cnp660oqp1xttouizfx8c/Appication-form-Birth-Cert.pdf?rlkey=11c1l9kr6xr3m3ami768omck8&dl=1=}. Simply download the form and fill it out with the required information.
